name: Space Alert
description:
Play Free Games on:
www.boogygames.com

Pilot your Space Ship through the deep space and collect Earth's life force and survive as long as possible.

Space Alert has a creative design and very comprehensive and easy to follow rules, yet it immediately becomes addictive. You are controlling your Space Ship and directing him so that collision with the tricky obstacles is avoided. Your Space Ship is the primary focus of this game and all the actions he was designed to perform such as avoiding obstacles and collecting essential items.

Features:
-Insanely simple and addictive
-Endless gameplay
-One Touch gameplay
-High scores with Game Center
